summary: Beirut, 1982: a young Palestinian refugee helps an Israeli fighter pilot escape from PLO captivity because he wants to visit his ancestral family home. En route through war-torn Lebanon their relationship develops into a close bond.
cast: Stephen Dorff|Abdallah El Akal|Alice Taglioni|Loai Nofi|Tarik Kopty|Johnny Arbid|Mira Awad|Eitan Londner|Morad Hassan|Ashraf Farah|Nidal Badarneh|Adham Abu Aqel|Osamah Khoury|Michel Khoury|Ali Suliman|Doraid Liddawi|Ashraf Barhom|Hezi Gangina|Avi Dangur|Shai Meir|Sam Ritzenberg|Doron Amit|Hisham Suliman|Aida Shahbarat|Vered Feldman|Ebrahim Qaduora|Sama Wakim|Mouna Hawa|Kais Matani|Safir Masri|Wasim Mattar|Maisam Masri|Adham Azba|Aseel Qaduora|Ehab Bahous|Michael Perdue|Gottfried Raph|Fredrich Lagow|Floris Tack|Thijs Bleeker|Maisam Masri
title: Zaytoun
